00013 TransactionLogger::TransactionLogger()
00014   :m_inHeader(true), m_empty(true), m_hasData(false) {}
00015 
00016 TransactionLogger::~TransactionLogger() {
00017   endFile();
00018 }

00022 void TransactionLogger::startFile(std::string fileName) {
00023   time_t cur_date;
00024 
00025   fileName = m_log->file_name(fileName);
00026   m_logFile.open(fileName.c_str());
00027   
00028   time(&cur_date);
00029   char *str_date = ctime(&cur_date);
00030   str_date[strlen(str_date)-1] = '\0'; // remove trailing \n
00031   m_logFile<<"<?xml version=\"1.0\" standalone=\"no\"?>\n\n"
00032           <<"<Log date=\""<<str_date<<"\">\n"
00033           <<" <Declare>"<<std::endl;
00034 }
00035 
00036 void TransactionLogger::endFile() {
00037   if( m_logFile.is_open() ) {
00038     if( !m_empty ) 
00039       m_logFile<<" </Tick>\n";
00040     m_logFile<<"</Log>"<<std::endl;
00041     m_logFile.close();
00042   }
00043 }
00044 
00045 void TransactionLogger::declInternal(Symbol const &timeline,
00046                                  Symbol const &owner) {
00047   if( m_inHeader ) {
00048     std::map<Symbol, Symbol>::value_type to_ins(timeline, owner);
00049     if( !m_internals.insert(to_ins).second ) {
00050       m_log->syslog("log")<<"WARN: timeline \""<<timeline
00051                        <<"\" multiply declared as internal.\n";
00052     }
00053   }
00054 }
00055 
00056 void TransactionLogger::declExternal(Symbol const &timeline,
00057                                  Symbol const &owner) {
00058   if( m_inHeader ) {
00059     m_externals[owner].insert(timeline);
00060   }
00061 }
00062 
00063 void TransactionLogger::endHeader(TICK init, std::string const &fileName) {
00064   if( m_inHeader ) {
00065     if( !( m_internals.empty() && m_externals.empty() ) ) {
00066       std::map< Symbol, std::list<Symbol> > intDecl;
00067       std::map<Symbol, Symbol>::const_iterator i;
00068 
00069       startFile(fileName);
00070       for(i=m_internals.begin(); m_internals.end()!=i; ++i) 
00071        intDecl[i->second].push_back(i->first);
00072 
00073       std::map<Symbol, std::set<Symbol> >::const_iterator e;
00074       std::map< Symbol, std::list<Symbol> >::iterator id;
00075 
00076       for(e=m_externals.begin(); m_externals.end()!=e; ++e) {
00077        m_logFile<<"  <Timelines reactor=\""<<e->first<<"\">\n";
00078        id = intDecl.find(e->first);
00079        if( intDecl.end()!=id ) {
00080          while( !id->second.empty() ) {
00081            m_logFile<<"   <Internal name=\""<<id->second.front()<<"\"/>\n";
00082            id->second.pop_front();
00083          }
00084          intDecl.erase(id);
00085        }
00086        std::set<Symbol>::const_iterator ed;
00087        for( ed=e->second.begin(); e->second.end()!=ed; ++ed ) 
00088          m_logFile<<"   <External name=\""<<*ed<<"\"/>\n";
00089        m_logFile<<"  </Timelines>\n";
00090       }
00091       // declaring remaining reactors that do not have exteranl timelines
00092       for(id=intDecl.begin(); intDecl.end()!=id; ++id) {
00093        m_logFile<<"  <Timelines reactor=\""<<id->first<<"\">\n";
00094        while( !id->second.empty() ) {
00095          m_logFile<<"   <Internal name=\""<<id->second.front()<<"\"/>\n";
00096          id->second.pop_front();
00097        }
00098        m_logFile<<"  </Timelines>\n";
00099       }
00100       m_logFile<<" </Declare>"<<std::endl;
00101     }
00102     m_inHeader = false;
00103   }
00104   newTick(init);
00105 }
00106 
00107 void TransactionLogger::newTick(TICK value) {
00108   m_lastTick = value;
00109   m_hasData = false;
00110 }
00111 
00112 void TransactionLogger::logObservation(Observation const &obs) {
00113   if( m_logFile.is_open() ) {
00114     Symbol const &name = obs.object();
00115     if( m_internals.find(name)!=m_internals.end() ) {
00116       openTick();
00117       obs.toXml(m_logFile, 2)<<std::endl;
00118     }
00119   }
00120 }
00121 
00122 void TransactionLogger::logRequest(Symbol const &reactor, goal_id const &goal) {
00123   if( m_logFile.is_open() ) {
00124     std::map<Symbol, std::set<Symbol> >::const_iterator e = m_externals.find(reactor);
00125     if( m_externals.end()!=e ) {
00126       openTick();
00127       m_logFile<<"  <Request from=\""<<reactor<<"\" id=\""<<goal<<"\">\n";
00128       goal->toXml(m_logFile, 3);
00129       m_logFile<<"  </Request>"<<std::endl;
00130     }
00131   }
00132 }
00133 
00134 void TransactionLogger::logRecall(Symbol const &reactor, goal_id const &goal) {
00135   if( m_logFile.is_open() ) {
00136     std::map<Symbol, std::set<Symbol> >::const_iterator e = m_externals.find(reactor);
00137     if( m_externals.end()!=e ) {
00138       openTick();
00139       m_logFile<<"  <Recall from=\""<<reactor
00140               <<"\" id=\""<<goal<<"\"/>"<<std::endl;
00141     }
00142   }
00143 }
00144 
00145 void TransactionLogger::openTick() {
00146   if( !m_hasData ) {
00147     m_hasData = true;
00148     if( m_empty )
00149       m_empty = false;
00150     else
00151       m_logFile<<" </Tick>\n";
00152     m_logFile<<" <Tick value=\""<<m_lastTick<<"\">\n";
00153   }
00154 }
